channel.title: .ser player files?
channel.description:
I need to change some playerfiles (i.e. change bank, inventory, all that jazz)
Like back when 317 were .txt files, and you would just edit them there..
I've tried everything, opening it with notepad, notepad++, eclipse, and a shit load of other programs
Can anyone help with this? (i'm using SpawnScape source)

item.title: .ser player files?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

.ser or Serialized Object File is a file that is using serialization.

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/ObjectInputStream.html

Have fun deserializing

Read full topic

item.title: .ser player files?
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

To do this, you need to find the place where it saves the players information. Once you find that .java, open it and find where it says to save the file as a .ser file, and simply change it to a .txt file.

Read full topic

item.title: .ser player files?
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

pm me your tv or skype and ill do it there.

Read full topic
